name: Rogue Bandits
description: Rogue and outcast, this raiders lurk in the forests, stalking prey without sound before striking with uncanny precision. With surprise on their side a dozen Rogue Bandits can catch and rob a much more well-armed foe.

abilities.name: Bandit Ataman
abilities.description: Add 1 to all attack rolls made for this Bandit. In addition, hero whoever slays Bandit Ataman can take 1 Gold Piece.

abilities.name: Bandit with Saber
abilities.description: This Bandit can attack with either Hunter Knife or Saber.

abilities.name: Bandit with Longbow
abilities.description: This Bandit can attack with either Hunter Knife or Longbow.

abilities.name: Bandit with Glaive
abilities.description: This Bandit can attack with either Hunter Knife or Glaive. If they attack with the Glaive, they can choose heroes within 2 spaces.

abilities.name: Bandit with Shield
abilities.description: This Bandit has a Vigour of 4 rather than 3.

difficultyBonuses.description: Instead of +1 to Vigour, add 1 to the Move and Agility of Rogue Bandits.

table.name: Ambush
table.description: Each Bandit moves towards the nearest hero and attacks it with the Hunter Knife. Then, roll a dice for each hero. If the result is more than the number of adjacent Bandits, then the hero dodges aside; otherwise, they are stunned, and new Bandit appears as close to that hero as possible.

table.name: Robbery
table.description: Each Bandit moves towards the nearest hero and attacks it with whichever weapon is in range. If any hero loses a wound from the Combat attack, they lose 1 Gold Piece as well.

table.name: Murder Them
table.description: Each Bandit moves. Then, each Bandit attacks the nearest hero with whichever weapon is in range.

table.name: Panic
table.description: Roll a dice for each Bandit on the board. On the roll of 1, Bandit moves to the North, on 2 - to the East, on 3 - to the South, on 4 - to the West. On the roll of 5-6, Bandit can move in any direction, and then attack the nearest hero with whichever weapon is in range. Ataman would never panic and can always act as 6 is rolled for them.
